definition[0]: in a satisfactory, pleasant, or attractive way
example[0]: He was handsome and nicely dressed.
example[1]: The table fits in nicely with the rest of the furniture.
example[3]: The garden’s coming along very nicely now  (=it is growing well).
definition[1]: in a pleasant, polite, or friendly way
example[4]: I’m sure he’ll help if you ask him nicely.
